forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain for the afternoon hours. High 3C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. Windy. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 41F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later at night. Low around 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few snow showers after midnight. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
